metadata.title: CVE-2022-23483 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
xrdp is an open source project which provides a graphical login to remotemachines using Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). xrdp < v0.9.21contain a Out of Bound Read in libxrdp_send_to_channel() function. Thereare no known workarounds for this issue. Users are advised to upgrade.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23483` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xrdp - 0.9.21.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xrdp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.21.1-1').
